headline.main: Improvised Bomb Kills U.S. Service Member in Afghanistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The service member, the third American killed in hostilities in Afghanistan this year, was on a mission against Islamic State fighters in Nangarhar Province....
lead_paragraph: The service member, the third American killed in hostilities in Afghanistan this year, was on a mission against Islamic State fighters in Nangarhar Province.
